name: Buta
storyline: In the little town of Akaoka, Japan, a bullied teen lives everyday in monotonous torment until he meets a newcomer, a strange girl who finally treats him well. This triggers an unnatural obsession in him as she becomes the final straw to an ever-deteriorating sanity and the monstrous transformation he'll take that'll change his hometown forever...
summary: "Buta" is a heart felt story told through text based indie gameplay.
